name: smith´s hat
sizes_available: m 57 cm (head circumference) / l 61 cm (head circumference)
notes:
smith ́s hat is a buttom-up knitted hat, pretty simple, but looks great with the diagonally lines.
a colleague did me a favor and i thanked him with the hat. and how else should it be, his name is smith. ;-)

for instagram use: #smithshat #kalmknit

this pattern is for free, but if you want to say “thank you”, please create a project here on ravelry. 
if you like to give me a little support for my next projects, feel free to do this to my paypal account: as a friend to: s.kalmbacher@online.de

enjoy the pattern!

yarn: www.querstricker.de or join on facebookgroup querstricker - wolle und design
